subject: Heisman Trophy
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: ESPN taped an interview with the Heisman hopeful Cam Newton in advance so that it could ask some tough questions but not put him on the spot in front of a festive live audience.
snippet: ESPN taped an interview with the Heisman hopeful Cam Newton in advance so that it could ask some tough questions but not put him on the spot in front of a festive live audience.
